amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act to the Internal Revenue Service may be obligated or expended on conferences.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to the IRS may be obligated or expended on conferences.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 264 - 157 (Roll no. 420).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 264 - 157 (Roll no. 420).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. DeSantis.
